summary: Back in October I went to Vegas for the first time, and overall I had a really good time and definitely want to go back again sometime.  But there’s a reason I haven’t posted about it.  I had one bad experience amidst my weekend of fun and good times, and up until now I wasn’t […]
title: The Good, The Bad, & The Vegas

title: Kindle samples
